about.title: What's my profession
about.p1: Throughout my life, I have had different occupations, but the world of IT has always been my main focus. After my experience in a metallurgical factory, I joined an important car factory

about.p4: I have only Free-lancer projects for the moment, but, my mind is open for everything

experience.title: Work Experience (IT)
experience.desc1: My tasks involved the maintenance, and post-production improvement, of an application developed in PHP intended for e-commerce.
experience.desc2: Development of static websites, and dynamic applications of greater complexity. In the latter, the use of the different libraries available to solve the commercial problem was very important.

projects.title: Some Projects
projects.desc1: Provide the best Marketing and Analytics strategies for digital businesses.
projects.desc2: Based on machine learning and combining its own algorithms that allow manual or automatic analysis of its spectral data to identify, count and measure microplastics.
projects.desc3: It is a sustainability project that aims to help in the diagnosis of water quality.
